title: Die-Hard And Fair-Weather Fans Alike Have A Case Of Royals Fever
teaser: Kansas City Royals beat the San Francisco Giants 7-2 Wednesday night, tying up the World Series. And most Royals fans, are feeling pretty good this October. They're amazed to see their team play baseball at all this post-season, and to even have a spot in the World Series.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
